#description: use R/T/S to transform radar point p_r into camera coordinates p_c=R*p_r+T
R: -0.0264814146660713 -0.999649386885150 0.00173906523035761 0.0121395165905959 -0.00206233611926795 -0.999925722855674 0.999576628994339 -0.0264570578759927 0.0121885681396033
T: 0.0659530032036776 0.108374858163385 0.0699178702997177
